card.text: Transcend 3BBB (At the beginning of combat, cast your chosen Erysite from outside the game by paying its Transcend cost and exiling a Dragon creature you control.) Trample When Omnipotent Vessel enters, search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Omnipresent Vessel
card.text: Transcend 3GGG (At the beginning of combat, cast your chosen Erysite from outside the game by paying its Transcend cost and exiling a Dragon creature you control.) Trample When Omnipresent Vessel enters, destroy target noncreature permanent.

card.name: Omniscient Vessel
card.text: Transcend 3UUU (At the beginning of combat, cast your chosen Erysite from outside the game by paying its Transcend cost and exiling a Dragon creature you control.) Trample When Omniscient Vessel enters, return another target permanent to its owner’s hand.

card.name: Intergenerational Violence
card.text: Menace Whenever a creature dies, that creature deals 1 damage to each of your opponents and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Svakaratajex Emissary
card.text: You may activate abilities of creatures you control as though they had haste. {T}: Target creature gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Policy Scrutiniser
card.text: When Policy Scrutiniser enters, exile up to one target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls until Policy Scrutiniser leaves the battlefield.

card.name: God-Worm Bulwark
card.text: Whenever God-Worm Bulwark attacks, you may embrace a card in your hand with a creature type. If you do, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens that are tapped and attacking. (Exile it. You may play it on a later turn that a source you control that shares a creature type with it dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Ithian Eulogist
card.text: When Ithian Eulogist enters, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put a creature card with toughness 2 or less from among them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Lightning's Protection
card.text: Create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is the number of creature types among non-Erysite permanents you control.

card.name: Herd Mentality
card.text: As Herd Mentality enters, choose a creature type. At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to two target creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Memorial Service
card.text: Return to your hand all permanent cards in your graveyard that were put there from anywhere this turn. {B/R}, Embrace Memorial Service from your hand: Draw a card. (Exile it. You may play it on a later turn that a Soldier or Advisor you control dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Found Family
card.text: Choose target nonland permanent with a creature type. Its owner embraces it. (Exile it. They may play it on a later turn that a source they control that shares a creature type with it dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Pass Regulation
card.text: Choose one — • Until end of turn, tokens can’t be created. • Liberate target creature you control. (Exile it if it isn’t a Dragon. If it’s exiled, its controller creates a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.)

card.name: Gatrix Vaults
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 1U. If you do, transform Gatrix Vaults. Otherwise, surveil 1. --- (Back): Gatrix Vaultwarden

card.name: Gatrix Vaultwarden
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, you may transform Gatrix Vaultwarden. Flying Gatrix Vaultwarden doesn’t untap during your untap steps. --- (Front): Gatrix Vaults

card.name: Qualia Hermitform
card.text: 1U: Target artifact or enchantment becomes a 3/3 Incarnation creature in addition to its other types until end of turn. Activate only at the beginning of combat.

card.name: Saviour of the Disfigured
card.text: When Saviour of the Disfigured enters, if it wasn’t cast from your hand, draw a card. {U}, Embrace Saviour of the Disfigured from your hand: Exile target nontoken creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control. (Exile it. You may cast it on a later turn that a Lizard or Survivor you control dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Essence Surgeon
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, liberate up to one target artifact, creature, or enchantment you control. (Exile it if it isn’t a Dragon. If it’s exiled, its controller creates a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.)

card.name: Old Guard Interrogator
card.text: Vigilance Exile a Human card from your graveyard: Until end of turn, Humans can’t be blocked.

card.name: Umweltenshifter
card.text: As Umweltenshifter enters, choose a creature type. Permanents you control are kindred and the chosen type in addition to their other types. The same is true for spells you control and cards you own that aren’t on the battlefield.

card.name: Sensations Overwhelming
card.text: Choose one or both— • Creatures target player controls get -2/-0 until end of turn. • Counter target spell.

card.name: Percival's Chosen
card.text: Percival’s Chosen enters tapped. When Percival’s Chosen dies, embrace it. (Exile it. You may play it on a later turn that a Human, Zombie, or Soldier you control dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Injector Evangelist
card.text: Whenever Injector Evangelist attacks, surveil 2. When Injector Evangelist leaves the battlefield, liberate another target creature card in your graveyard with mana value 4 or less. (Exile it if it isn’t a Dragon. If it’s exiled, its controller creates a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.)

card.name: Jobseeker's Allowance
card.text: You draw a card and you lose 1 life. {G/W}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard, Embrace Jobseeker’s Allowance from your graveyard: Surveil 1. (Exile it. You may play it on a later turn that a Citizen you control dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Seanced Politician
card.text: When Seanced Politician enters, search your library for a card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle. {B}, Exile two nonland cards in your graveyard with the same name: Draw a card.

card.name: Hired Bouncer
card.text: Flash, menace When Hired Bouncer enters, if it was cast, each player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Mental Sewage
card.text: When Mental Sewage enters, if it was cast, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Traffic Warden
card.text: {B}: Mill a card. Then if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, Traffic Warden gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Urdonic Attendant
card.text: Menace When you cast your second non-Human spell in a turn, liberate Urdonic Attendant. This ability triggers only once. (Exile it if it isn’t a Dragon. If it’s exiled, its controller creates a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.)

card.name: Unburdent Matriarch
card.text: Ward—Pay 2 life. Dragons you control get +1/+1 and have haste.

card.name: Motel Manager
card.text: Trample Motel Manager gets +1/+0 for each card you own in exile.

card.name: Cunning Qualiaform
card.text: Bisapience {R} (Cast either half of this card. Pay bisapience once each turn as a sorcery to transform for that turn.) {R}, Discard a card: Exile the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand. --- (Back): Cunning Thoughtlich

card.name: Cunning Thoughtlich
card.text: Bisapience {R} Trample Whenever Cunning Thoughtlich attacks, you may cast a card exiled by it. --- (Front): Cunning Qualiaform

card.name: Dragon Soldier
card.text: Flying, first strike Whenever Dragon Soldier attacks, another target attacking Soldier gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Melting Pot
card.text: Nonbasic lands enter the battlefield tapped unless they can produce {C}. When Melting Pot enters, destroy up to one target nonbasic land. Its controller searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

card.name: Host Farm Babysitter
card.text: When Host Farm Babysitter dies, create a 1/1 green Hex Citizen creature token. GG, Sacrifice Host Farm Babysitter: Destroy target noncreature artifact or noncreature enchantment.

card.name: Hazenwyld Revelward
card.text: Bisapience {G} (Cast either half of this card. Pay bisapience once each turn as a sorcery to transform for that turn.) Vigilance, reach --- (Back): Hazenwyld Reveller

card.name: Hazenwyld Reveller
card.text: Bisapience {G} 4G: Mill four cards. You may put a creature card milled this way into your hand. --- (Front): Hazenwyld Revelward

card.name: Accommodation
card.text: As Accommodation enters, choose a creature type. When Accommodation enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, create a colorless Equipment artifact token named House with “Equipped creature gets +1/+1” and “Equip creature with the chosen type {1}.”

card.name: Relentless Firefighter
card.text: Trample When Relentless Firefighter dies, surveil 2. {6}: Return Relentless Firefighter from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. Activate only if there’s four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Inclusivity Consultant
card.text: Flash Reach When Inclusivity Consultant enters, put up to one target card an opponent owns in exile into their graveyard.

card.name: Trueblight Blessing
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Hex you control. Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Waste Management
card.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Waste Management. {U/B}, Embrace Waste Management from your hand: Draw a card. (Exile it. You may cast it on a later turn that an Artificer or Citizen you control dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Shred
card.text: Shred deals 4 damage to target planeswalker or tapped creature.

card.name: Spread His Formula
card.text: If you haven’t cast a spell named Spread His Formula this turn, you may cast Spread His Formula from your graveyard. The next time target creature deals damage to an opponent this turn, you draw a card.

card.name: Vanaja of Black Sunday
card.text: Flash When Vanaja enters, tap up to two target nonland permanents. Whenever one or more Humans you control deal combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Erysian Designs
card.text: You may cast Erysite spells from outside the game for their transcend cost. (Even if you already have or it’s not your chosen Erysite.) Whenever you cast a transcended Erysite spell, draw two cards.

card.name: Eusocial Signal
card.text: Draw two cards, then exile two cards from your hand. If both cards exiled this way share a creature type, embrace them. (You may play a card embraced this way on a later turn that a source you control that shares a creature type with it dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Mask Identity
card.text: Enchant nonland permanent Enchanted permanent is kindred and loses all other card types. (It still has its abilities and creature types.)

card.name: The Urveil
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. If the Urveil was embraced, add WUBRG instead. {3}, Embrace the Urveil from your hand: Create a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token. (Exile it. You may play it on a later turn that an Erysite you control dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Herongrand Transcended
card.text: Transcend 3UUBB (At the beginning of combat, cast your chosen Erysite from outside the game by paying its Transcend cost and exiling a Dragon creature you control.) Flying This spell can’t be countered. UB, Pay 1 life: Draw a card. Herongrand phases out. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Lyyrata, Progeny of Erys
card.text: Usurpate (At the beginning of combat on your turn, cast this from outside the game by paying ten {R/W} and exiling a transcended Erysite you control.) Flying, hexproof If Lyyrata usurped, creatures you control get +5000/+5000.

card.name: PrithiteWordlyDicta
card.text: Flying Mill a card. Put that card into your hand unless an opponent pays life equal to its mana value. Prithite’s Worldly Dicta deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the number of land cards in your graveyard. ​

card.name: Triaja, Astral Apostate
card.text: Whenever another creature you control with lesser power enters, you may liberate it. Do this only once each turn. (Exile it if it isn’t a Dragon. If it’s exiled, its controller creates a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.)

card.name: Akaaja, Steel Commander
card.text: Akaaja, Steel Commander can’t attack or block unless you pay {4}. Whenever you attack, put a +1/+1 counter on another target attacking Hex. Then draw a card if Akaaja has lesser power than that Hex.

card.name: Clutch Divinity
card.text: Transcend 1BBB (At the beginning of combat, cast your chosen Erysite from outside the game by paying its Transcend cost and exiling a Dragon creature you control.) Mill five cards. For each card milled this way, put it into your hand unless an opponent pays 3 life.

card.name: Split Ego
card.text: Liberate target creature, artifact, or enchantment X times. X can’t be 0. (Exile it if it isn’t a Dragon. If it’s exiled, its controller creates X colorless 3/2 Dragon creature tokens with its abilities.)

card.name: Renewed Servitude
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a card from your graveyard. Exile target spell or nonland permanent that shares a card type with the exiled card. (Kindred is a card type.)

card.name: Witness Totality
card.text: Transcend 1RRR (At the beginning of combat, cast your chosen Erysite from outside the game by paying its Transcend cost and exiling a Dragon creature you control.) At the beginning of your upkeep, Witness Totality deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Original Position
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile a creature card from your graveyard at random. Create a token that’s a copy of it.

card.name: Eyysapha, Syakir in Exile
card.text: Prowess, vigilance {T}: Choose target creature card you own in exile that was put there from the battlefield this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, create a token that’s a copy of it.

card.name: Hazenwyld Totem
card.text: {T}, Embrace a card with a creature type from your hand: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target permanent that shares a creature type with that card, then draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery. (Exile it. You may cast it on a later turn that a source you control that shares a creature type with it dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Heavy Tutelage
card.text: Put a stun counter on up to one target creature. Draw four cards.

card.name: Echo Eternity
card.text: Transcend 1UUU (At the beginning of combat, cast your chosen Erysite from outside the game by paying its Transcend cost and exiling a Dragon creature you control.) Create a token that’s a copy of target permanent you control.

card.name: Erys' Salvation
card.text: Liberate all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments you control. (Exile it if it isn’t a dragon. If it’s exiled, create a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.)

card.name: Breathe Gravity
card.text: Transcend 1WWW (At the beginning of combat, cast your chosen Erysite from outside the game by paying its Transcend cost and exiling a Dragon creature you control.) Return any number of nonland permanent cards with total mana value 6 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Ingest Infinity
card.text: Transcend 1GGG (At the beginning of combat, cast your chosen Erysite from outside the game by paying its Transcend cost and exiling a Dragon creature you control.) Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Lukka, Godbonder
card.text: Bisapience UU (Cast either half of this card. Pay bisapience once each turn as a sorcery to transform for that turn.) [0]: Target permanent you control gains haste until end of turn. [-1]: Discard a card. When you do, Lukka deals 2 damage to any target. --- (Back): The Last Aetherbeast

card.name: The Last Aetherbeast
card.text: Bisapience RR Whenever The Last Aetherbeast deals combat damage to a player, put a loyalty counter on it and draw a card. --- (Front): Lukka, Godbonder

card.name: Defiant Roar
card.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. It must be blocked this turn if able.

card.name: Trounce
card.text: This spell can’t be countered if it has exactly one target. Trounce deals 4 damage divided among one or two targets.

card.name: High School
card.text: {G}, {T}, Discard a card with a creature type: Search your library for a card with at least one of that card’s creature types, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Therian Whispers
card.text: Search your library for a card with a creature type, embrace it, then shuffle. You lose 2 life. (Exile it. You may play it on a later turn that a source you control that shares a creature type with it dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Thawion, Shield of Ur
card.text: Flying, first strike If an ability of a non-Dragon creature you control triggers, you may have that ability trigger an additional time for each Dragon you control. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: Unfair Birth
card.text: Destroy up to two target creatures, enchantments, and/or planeswalkers with total mana value 2 or less.

card.name: Self-Jailing Sire
card.text: Bisapience—{R} (Cast either half of this card. Pay bisapience once each turn as a sorcery to transform for that turn.) Menace --- (Back): That Gross Authentic Self

card.name: That Gross Authentic Self
card.text: Bisapience {R} Sacrifice a creature: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast it. If you don’t, put a +1/+1 counter on That Gross Authentic Self. --- (Front): Self-Jailing Sire

card.name: Channel the Call
card.text: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. If you don’t, Channel the Call deals 2 damage to each opponent. Whenever a permanent you control transforms or enters transformed, return Channel the Call from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Urdonsonder
card.text: Until end of turn, target permanent you control is a 5/5 Incarnation Dragon creature with reach and haste in addition to its other types. Untap that permanent.

card.name: Frail Vassal
card.text: Bisapience {G} (Cast either half of this card. Pay bisapience once each turn as a sorcery to transform for that turn.) {1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target transformed permanent. Activate only as a sorcery. --- (Back): Protective Sire

card.name: Protective Sire
card.text: Bisapience {G} {2}: Untap Protective Sire. --- (Front): Frail Vassal

card.name: Novablast's Worldview
card.text: “Urdonic strength protects Ur’s creation. Your weakness is Akella’s health.” —Novablast I, II — Destroy target creature with the least power or tied for the least. III — If you control the creature with the greatest power or tied for it, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life. ​

card.name: Erys' Worldview
card.text: “The strong and weak can’t coexist. Rise to their level, bring them down.” —Erys, Memoirs I, II — Liberate target creature you control. (Exile it if it isn’t a Dragon. If it’s exiled, its controller creates a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.) III — If you control no non-Dragon creatures, you gain 5 life. ​

card.name: Hazenwyld's Worldview
card.text: “Erys plans to remove our bisapience, our identity. ‘Course we hate the daft prick!” —Gristlethark I, II — Up to one target creature gets +2/+2 and gains menace until end of turn. III — Transform target creature you control. When you do, it fights up to one target creature you don’t control. ​

card.name: Thawion's Worldview
card.text: “Urdonic strength is a curse. Our purpose is to protect those without it from it.” —Thawion, Justiciar I, II — Mill three cards. You may put a creature or land card milled this way into your hand. III — If there are eight or more creature types among non-Erysite creatures you control, creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. ​

card.name: Lukka's Worldview
card.text: “I won’t kowtow to an urdon’s false strength. They have no idea how weak they truly are.” —Lukka, Godbonder I, II — Tap target creature and put a stun counter on it. III — If you have 5 or more life than an opponent, gain control of target tapped creature. ​

card.name: Infested Fortress
card.text: Flying When Infested Fortress enters, create two 1/1 green Hex Citizen creature tokens. Infested Fortress can’t attack or block unless you sacrifice a creature.

card.name: Suppressive Fire
card.text: Suppressive Fire deals 2 damage to each creature. {W/U}, Embrace Suppressive Fire from your hand: Draw a card. (Exile it. You may cast it on a later turn that a Soldier or Wizard you control dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Minister of Welfare
card.text: Vigilance, protection from tokens When Minister of Welfare enters, if an opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference and you gain that much life.

card.name: Abiogenesis
card.text: Liberate target artifact or enchantment. (Exile it if it isn’t a Dragon. If it’s exiled, its controller creates a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.) {R/G}, Embrace Abiogenesis from your hand: Draw a card. (Exile it. You may play it on a later turn that a Wizard or Artificer you control dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Sapience Spreading
card.text: 1G: Liberate target land you control. The token created this way enters tapped. (Exile it if it isn’t a Dragon. If it’s exiled, its controller creates a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.) Tap an untapped Dragon you control: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Besotted Courtier
card.text: Discard a card: Liberate Besotted Courtier. (Exile it if it isn’t a Dragon. If it’s exiled, its controller creates a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.)

card.name: Omnificient Vessel
card.text: Transcend 3RRR (At the beginning of combat, cast your chosen Erysite from outside the game by paying its Transcend cost and exiling a Dragon creature you control.) Trample When Omnificient Vessel enters, each player may discard their hand. Each player that does draws five cards.

card.name: Gentrification
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Then sacrifice a nontoken permanent.

card.name: Access Tunnel
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}: Target creature you control with power 3 or less can’t be blocked this turn.

card.name: Siege of Percitha
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell with one or more colors from anywhere other than your hand, Siege of Percitha deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Frail Friendship
card.text: As Frail Friendship enters, choose two creature types. Once each turn, when you cast a spell with only one of the chosen types, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal one that’s the other type, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Karaja, Heroic Trueblight
card.text: Exile a nonland permanent you own: Put two loyalty counters on Karaja. Activate only once each turn as a sorcery. [-1]: Exile target card in a graveyard. Create a 1/1 black Serf creature token. [-2]: Surveil 2, then draw two cards. [-4]: Exile target nonland permanent.

card.name: Ithian Highblood
card.text: Prowess Prowess abilities of permanents you control also trigger whenever another Lizard or Wizard you control enters.

card.name: Mass Migration
card.text: Whenever a land you control enters, return target permanent card from your graveyard with mana value 1 or 2 to the battlefield with a finality counter on it.

card.name: Ineffable Spawning
card.text: If you would draw a card, instead exile the top card of your library and create a 1/1 red Incarnation creature token with flying. For as long as that card remains exiled, you may play it by sacrificing an Incarnation in addition to its other costs.

card.name: Atraja the Mutable
card.text: {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card. If an Incarnation is discarded this way, create a 1/1 red Incarnation creature token with flying. 1BR, Sacrifice three creatures: You may cast target card with a creature type from your graveyard without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Ruthless Revenge
card.text: Whenever Ruthless Revenge attacks or blocks, if a creature hasn’t died this turn, sacrifice a creature. Sacrifice Ruthless Revenge, Discard a card: Draw a card.

card.name: Aetherbeast Scholar
card.text: Prowess Whenever Aetherbeast Scholar deals combat damage to a player, each player may shuffle their hand and graveyard into their library. If they do, they draw seven cards.

card.name: Identity Connoisseur
card.text: When Identity Connoisseur enters, target player discards a card. Whenever a player discards a card with a creature type, you embrace it, and you may spend mana as though it was mana of any color to cast it. (Exile it. You may cast it on a later turn that a source you control that shares a creature type with it dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Ixaja's Stalwart
card.text: Flash Trample When Ixaja’s Stalwart enters, another target Hex you control gets +6/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Injector Lobbyist
card.text: Lifelink As Injector Lobbyist enters, choose a noncreature card type or a creature type. Spells of the chosen type cost {1} more to cast.

card.name: Sustain Worldbalance
card.text: Whenever you cast a monocolored spell, create a 4/4 colorless Dragon creature token if each color is noted with Sustain Worldbalance. Otherwise note that color, then draw a card if it wasn’t already noted.

card.name: Decay
card.text: Deathtouch Rather than sacrifice a permanent with a given quality, you may exile a card with that quality from your graveyard. (For example, if you sacrifice a creature, you can exile a creature from your yard instead.You can’t exile cards to pay a self-sacrifice cost.)

card.name: Kasta of Infinite Sires

card.name: Steal the Ur-Gift
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast from exile. Steal the Ur-Gift deals X damage to any target. {2}, Embrace Steal the Ur-Gift from your hand: Draw a card. (Exile it. You may cast it on a later turn that a Dragon or a Wizard you control dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Lunette, Imperial Strategist

card.name: Detritus Dredger
card.text: {2}: Exile target card in a graveyard. For each card type among cards exiled by Detritus Dredger, it gets +1/+1 and hexproof from that type. (Kindred is a card type.)

card.name: Glimpse of Equality
card.text: Flash All creatures lose all abilities and creature types and are Dragons with base power and toughness 2/2. At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Glimpse of Equality.

card.name: Algaja, Lord of Disregard

card.name: Disaster Responder

card.name: Hyyiroe, Revolution's Steed
card.text: Transcend 3GGWW (At the beginning of combat, cast your chosen Erysite from outside the game by paying its Transcend cost and exiling a Dragon creature you control.) Flying When Hyyiroe dies, Mill six cards. Put up to two creature cards with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield.

card.name: Erys' Memoirs
card.text: When Erys’ Memoirs enters, it deals 3 damage to any target if you control a Dragon. Whenever you create one or more Dragon tokens, draw a card.

card.name: Empathystorm
card.text: Ward—Sacrifice a nontoken permanent. At the beginning of your end step, choose left or right. Starting with you, each player looks at the hand of the nearest opponent in the chosen direction and may cast a card from that hand without paying its mana cost.

prop.notes: OTHERRARE WORK PENCILIN ADVISORTYPE NOBLECYC !replacetoken Liberated Reminder;1

card.text: When King Platinum enters, if he isn’t a token, mill three cards, then liberate those cards. (Exile it if it isn’t a Dragon. If it’s exiled, its controller creates a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.)

card.name: Old Guard Blackrod
card.text: Menace Whenever Old Guard Blackrod attacks, surveil 2. If an Advisor is put into your graveyard this way, Old Guard Blackrod deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Unextinct Cavern
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Exile a card with a creature type from your graveyard: Until end of turn, Unextinct Cavern becomes a 2/2 creature with that card’s creature types. It’s still a land.

card.name: Submerged Spires
card.text: Bisapience 2UG (Play either half of this card. Once each turn, pay this cost as a sorcery to transform it until end of turn.) Submerged Spires enters tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {G}. --- (Back): Emerged Stonepiler

card.name: Emerged Stonepiler
card.text: Bisapience {0} Vigilance Emerged Stonepiler can’t be blocked. --- (Front): Submerged Spires

card.name: Denizen of New Akella Alt

prop.notes: COLOURLESSCOMMON !exportname Denizen of New Akella Alt

card.text: Transcend {6} (At the beginning of combat, cast your chosen Erysite from outside the game by paying its Transcend cost and exiling a Dragon creature you control.) Trample

card.name: Gigant Nestcrafter
card.text: Flying When Gigant Nestcrafter enters, if it was cast, search your library for an artifact or enchantment card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Homestead of the Meek
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Whenever you cast an artifact or enchantment spell, create a 1/1 green Hex Citizen creature token.

card.name: In Lukka's Thrall
card.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. When you don’t control a creature with greater power than enchanted creature, return In Lukka’s Thrall to its owner’s hand. (Only if it’s still on the battlefield.)

card.name: Argent Court Enraged
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, tap X other untapped artifacts or enchantments you control. If X is 1 or more, surveil 1. If X is 3 or more, draw a card. If X is 6 or more, Argent Court Enraged becomes a 6/5 Artificer Noble creature with trample until end of turn.

card.name: Condemned Buildling
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {2}, {T}: Add {G} for each card type among permanents you control. (Kindred is a card type.)

card.name: Exalted Extrusion
card.text: For each double-faced, nonland, nontoken permanent you control, create a token that’s a copy of its other face. (The tokens are double-sided.)

card.name: Lightning Sarajii
card.text: This spell can’t be countered. Reach, trample Ward—A creature you control fights Lightning. When Lightning dies, you gain 6 life and draw a card.

card.name: Sired Poultry
card.text: Bisapience {G} (Cast either half of this card. Pay bisapience once each turn as a sorcery to transform for that turn.) Haste Whenever another Werewolf you control enters, add {R} or {G}. --- (Back): Vengeant Skarrgspawn

card.name: Vengeant Skarrgspawn
card.text: Bisapience {R} Trample When Vengeant Skarrgspawn enters, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each other Werewolf you control and each Werewolf card in your graveyard. --- (Front): Sired Poultry

card.name: Gristle, Fierce Vassal
card.text: Bisapience {7} (Cast either half of this card. Pay bisapience once each turn as a sorcery to transform for that turn.) Whenever Gristle, Fierce Vassal enters or attacks, draw a card for each transformed permanent you control. --- (Back): Gristlethark, Godsire

card.name: Gristlethark, Godsire
card.text: Bisapience—Discard a card. Trample Whenever Gristlethark, Godsire enters or attacks, double the power of another target creature you control until end of turn. --- (Front): Gristle, Fierce Vassal

card.name: Novablast, Blade of Ur
card.text: Flying, haste Dragons you control have “Ward— Sacrifice a permanent.” At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent pays the cost of each ward ability among permanents you control. If they can’t, they lose the game.

card.name: Prithitian Justiciar
card.text: Flying, vigilance As Prithitian Justiciar enters, choose two card names other than Prithitian Justiciar. Spells with a chosen name can’t be cast. You choose if creatures with a chosen name attack or block each combat and how they attack or block.

card.name: Stellar Spymasters
card.text: When Stellar Spymasters enters, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”) {T}, Sacrifice Stellar Spymasters: Any number of target creatures you control phase out.

card.name: Prithite's Summons
card.text: When Prithite’s Summons enters, for each player, exile up to one other target nonland, nontoken permanent that player controls until Prithite’s Summons leaves the battlefield. {3}: Exile Prithite’s Summons. At the beginning of the next end step, return it to the battlefield under your control. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Prithite, Grand Orator
card.text: Flying Sacrifice a land: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Exposed Ridge
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {W}. --- (Back): Heziir, Heretic's Sanctum

card.name: Heziir, Heretic's Sanctum
card.text: When Heziir enters, choose a color. Then sacrifice it unless you exile an untapped basic land you control until Heziir leaves the battlefield. {T}: Add {W} and one mana of the chosen color. --- (Front): Exposed Ridge

card.name: Exposed City
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {R}. --- (Back): Klata, God's Plaything

card.name: Klata, God's Plaything
card.text: When Klata enters, choose a color. Then sacrifice it unless you exile an untapped basic land you control until Klata leaves the battlefield. {T}: Add {R} and one mana of the chosen color. --- (Front): Exposed City

card.name: Exposed Graves
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {B}. --- (Back): Stainlark, Tomb of Erys

card.name: Stainlark, Tomb of Erys
card.text: When Stainlark enters, choose a color. Then sacrifice it unless you exile an untapped basic land you control until Stainlark leaves the battlefield. {T}: Add {B} and one mana of the chosen color. --- (Front): Exposed Graves

card.name: Exposed Hinterland
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G}. --- (Back): Regarjex, Nest of Tyranny

card.name: Regarjex, Nest of Tyranny
card.text: When Regarjex enters, choose a color. Then sacrifice it unless you exile an untapped basic land you control until Regarjex leaves the battlefield. {T}: Add {G} and one mana of the chosen color. --- (Front): Exposed Hinterland

card.name: Exposed Coast
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {U}. --- (Back): Erythea, Justiciar's Rest

card.name: Erythea, Justiciar's Rest
card.text: When Erythea enters, choose a color. Then sacrifice it unless you exile an untapped basic land you control until Erythea leaves the battlefield. {T}: Add {U} and one mana of the chosen color. --- (Front): Exposed Coast

card.name: Prithite's Palace Lost
card.text: If a basic land you control would leave the battlefield, you may return it to its owner’s hand instead. {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Untap each Lair you control. Then if you control five or more Lairs with different names, you win the game.

card.name: Thoughtlich's Backup
card.text: Lifelink; changeling (This card is every creature type.) Whenever you cast a spell, if you control two or more other permanents that share a creature type with it, put a +1/+1 counter on Thoughtlich’s Backup.

card.name: Ilx, Mothweft Ambassador
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Ilx, embrace four other Advisors from your graveyard. (Exile them. You may cast them on a later turn that a source you control that shares a creature type with it dealt damage to an opponent.) You may cast Ilx from your graveyard. Flying

card.name: Pillar of Worldbalance
card.text: {1}, {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Pillar of Worldbalance: You liberate an artifact, creature, or enchantment card exiled by it with mana value 3 or less. Activate only as a sorcery. (If it isn’t a Dragon, create a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.)

card.name: Assert Territory
card.text: Reveal the top eight cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards revealed this way that share a creature type and have mana value 3 or less onto the battlefield, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Condemn the Ungrateful
card.text: Each opponent loses 1 life for each token you control. Destroy all creatures.

card.name: Envoy of the Accord
card.text: At the beginning of each player’s end step, that player may tap each untapped creature and land they control, then draw a card for each creature tapped this way.

card.name: Untie the Moral Knot
card.text: Exile all permanents with mana value 1 or greater.

card.name: Lukka's Ascension
card.text: Gain control of all permanents you don’t control until end of turn and untap them. They gain haste and can’t be sacrificed this turn. Exile Lukka’s Ascension.

card.name: Platinum's Spymaster
card.text: Flash; flying, ward {2} 1U, Embrace Platinum’s Spymaster from your hand: Counter target spell with mana value 4 or less unless its controller pays {2}. (Exile it. You may cast it on a later turn that a Dragon or Rogue you control dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Reject the Stars
card.text: Choose one — • Exile target artifact or enchantment with mana value 3 or less. • Exile target spell that wasn’t cast from its owner’s hand.

card.name: Grocery Shopper
card.text: Bisapience—Exile six cards from your graveyard. (Cast either half of this card. Pay bisapience once each turn as a sorcery to transform for that turn.) --- (Back): Toxic Skavaratakla

card.name: Toxic Skavaratakla
card.text: Bisapience BB Whenever another creature enters or blocks, it gets -0/-4 until end of turn. --- (Front): Grocery Shopper

card.name: Swiftpaw Striker
card.text: Bisapience—Discard a card. (Cast either half of this card. Pay bisapience once each turn as a sorcery to transform for that turn.) Whenever you play a card from exile, this creature gains double strike until end of turn. --- (Back): Swiftmind Sage

card.name: Swiftmind Sage
card.text: Bisapience—Discard a card. Flying Whenever Swiftmind Sage deals damage to an opponent, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn. --- (Front): Swiftpaw Striker

card.name: Tranquil Marketplace
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact and an enchantment: Draw a card.

card.name: Omnipotence
card.text: Exile each opponent’s graveyard and library. For the rest of the game, they don’t lose the game if they would draw a card from an empty library unless you control a transcended Erysite.

card.name: Death Drive
card.text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1. Whenever you attack, create a token that’s a copy of another target attacking creature tapped and attacking. Sacrifice the token at end of turn.

card.name: Separation of Worlds
card.text: Whenever a permanent doesn’t have a burdent or unburdent counter on it, its controller puts one of those counters on that permanent. This ability triggers only once each turn per permanent. Burdent permanents have protection from unburdent permanents, and vice versa. Burdent creatures you control get +3/+3. Tap an unburdent creature you control: Add GGG.

card.name: Callwolf Replica
card.text: Callwolf Replica gets +2/+1 as long as you own an embraced card in exile. When Callwolf Replica dies, it deals damage equal to its power to each opponent.

card.name: Endless Vassals
card.text: Return any number of target creature cards with no creature types in common from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Thoughtglass Shaper
card.text: When Thoughtglass Shaper enters, create a Treasure token. (It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)
